title: Is Jesus for the Jewish
description: I have written this book so that if anyone who is Jewish wants to see if Jesus is the Messiah, they can read and see the amazing amount of evidence that Jesus is not only the Messiah, but God. I havenâ€™t read very many other books on the subject, but one difference that think would separate the book is that I believe that Jewish people can be saved.
author: William Dean Hamilton
